Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Makes provision for construction and financing of facilities for the New York state library association
Summary: Makes provisions for construction and financing of facilities for the New York Library Association, Inc. by the dormitory authority; permits payment or assignment of public moneys to the authority; limits bond amount to five million dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the construction and financing of facilities by the dormitory authority for the New York Library Association; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
